summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3991 for the improvement of 4th Avenue from Virginia Street to Cedar Street; by the installation of a street lighting system; and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48531, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
